topic.title: 주식 투자
topic.description: 주식 투자는 회사의 일부 소유권을 사는 행위입니다. 초급 단계에서는 주식 투자의 기본적인 개념과 용어를 배웁니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: A: 안녕하세요, 주식 투자에 대해 배우고 싶어요.
B: 좋아요. 주식 투자는 회사의 일부 소유권을 사는 것이에요.
B: 회사가 성장하면, 돈을 벌 수 있기 때문이죠.
B: 네, 가격이 오르거나 내릴 수 있어요.
B: 네, 회사의 가치와 수익률 같은 것들을 알아볼 거예요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: A: Hello, I want to learn about **stock investment**.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: A: Hello, | I want to learn about stock investment.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: B: Okay. **Stock investment** is **buying a piece of ownership in a company**.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: B: Okay. | Stock investment is | buying a piece of ownership in a company.
A: Why do people do that?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: B: **If the company grows**, **because you can make money**.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: B: If the company grows, | because you can make money.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: B: Yes, **prices can go up or down**.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: B: Yes, | prices can go up or down.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: A: **Let's start with basic terms** I want to learn.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: A: Let's start with basic terms | I want to learn.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: B: Yes, we will look at things like **company's value** and **return rate**.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: B: Yes, | we will look at things like company's value | and return rate.
